2024.title: EDGE FL series of fiber lasers
2024.description: EDGE fiber lasers combine innovative design with the high-volume manufacturing methods Coherent perfected to eliminate the traditional compromise between quality and affordability.

2024.title: Stretto
2024.description: The Stretto is a high precision tunable external-cavity diode laser, available for narrow linewidth emission from ultraviolet to infrared.

2024.title: Corona™ AFX-2000 laser
2024.description: The Corona™ AFX-2000 from nLIGHT is a laser with beam shaping technology for use in laser powder bed fusion processes for metal additive manufacturing.

2024.title: 872 Series High-Resolution Laser Wavelength Meter
2024.description: The 872 Series Laser Wavelength Meter  can detect very small wavelength deviations making it ideal for experiments where a laser’s frequency must be actively regulated.

2024.title: XLDHe High Power System
2024.description: XLDHe High Power System is a cryogen-free, helium-4 powered measurement system that delivers extremely high cooling power for experiments in the 1 K temperature range.
